scripts.postinstall: ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main --first-only --create-ivy-entry-points && electron-builder install-app-deps
scripts.electron:serve:face-recognition: wait-on http-get://localhost:4200/ && npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition && electron . --serve
scripts.electron:local:face-recognition: npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition && npm run build:production:face-recognition && electron .
scripts.electron:linux:face-recognition: npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition && npm run build:production:face-recognition && electron-builder build --linux --config electron/face-recognition/electron-builder.json -c.extraMetadata.main=electron/face-recognition/main.js
scripts.electron:windows:face-recognition: npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition && npm run build:production:face-recognition && electron-builder build --windows --config electron/face-recognition/electron-builder.json -c.extraMetadata.main=electron/face-recognition/main.js
scripts.electron:mac:face-recognition: npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition && npm run build:production:face-recognition && electron-builder build --mac --config electron/face-recognition/electron-builder.json -c.extraMetadata.main=electron/face-recognition/main.js
scripts.electron:serve:face-recognition-admin: wait-on http-get://localhost:4201/ && npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition-admin && electron . --serve
scripts.electron:local:face-recognition-admin: npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition-admin && npm run build:production:face-recognition-admin && electron .
scripts.electron:linux:face-recognition-admin: npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition-admin && npm run build:production:face-recognition-admin && electron-builder build --linux --config electron/face-recognition-admin/electron-builder.json -c.extraMetadata.main=electron/face-recognition-admin/main.js
scripts.electron:windows:face-recognition-admin: npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition-admin && npm run build:production:face-recognition-admin && electron-builder build --windows --config electron/face-recognition-admin/electron-builder.json -c.extraMetadata.main=electron/face-recognition-admin/main.js
scripts.electron:mac:face-recognition-admin: npm run electron:serve-tsc:face-recognition-admin && npm run build:production:face-recognition-admin && electron-builder build --mac --config electron/face-recognition-admin/electron-builder.json -c.extraMetadata.main=electron/face-recognition-admin/main.js
